description:
If you had problems uploading to yfrog.com you can now try mobypicture.com sharing.

Enhance your photos and share them with your friends. 

ImageWorker is a 100% local image processing app on WebOS. It doesn't depend on data connection coverage, it's fast and saves you bandwidth and therefore money.

Features:

* Zoom, Resize and Crop
* Brightness, Contrast, Gamma, Saturation and AutoLevels
* Posterize, 8-bit filter, focus and Frames
* Project -> Save As, Print and YFrog upload
* Color -> B&W, Sepia, Vintage (Red, Green or Blue) and Channel selection
* Filters -> Blur, Sharp, Edge and Negative
* Resize -> 640, 800, 1200 pixel width
* Rotation
* flip horizontal and vertical
* Crop (mark region first)
* Red Eye removal (mark region first)
* Pixelation
* Blacken out areas
* Image stamp
* Community functions (share image directly after saving or yfrog upload)
* Support for Facebook App, Twee, Bad Kitty, Spaz, Email and Message App
* Send your images to Pinterest after yfrog upload
* optionally parameter launch: write filename into file /media/internal/iworker_load.txt before launch

Load your photo, resize it to the necessary size, apply any enhancement you want (use back-swipe to undo the last step) and save it, print it or share it on yfrog (needs a free registration).

Update:
* grid layer
